title: The Tour de France is Not Done: Tadej Poga훾ar Still Has a Three Week Problem
content:
Poga훾ar and UAE Emirates ruled the Galbier, but third-week individual strength will be what counts: 'It's a very long way to Nice.'

Read the full article at The Tour de France is Not Done: Tadej Poga훾ar Still Has a Three Week Problem on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
